author: Thibault Spirlet
title: The UK reportedly plans to woo the ultra-rich back with a new 'golden visa.' Analysts say the damage may already be done.
description: Having long been a hub for the world's richest people, the UK is now seen as a "hostile" environment by many millionaires, one analyst said.
content:
London's financial district has long been a magnet for global wealth, but thousands of millionaires are now leaving the UK amid tax hikes and uncertainty.Andrew Winning/Reuters
